metadata.title: CVE-2019-14864 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Ansible, versions 2.9.x before 2.9.1, 2.8.x before 2.8.7 and Ansibleversions 2.7.x before 2.7.15, is not respecting the flag no_log set it toTrue when Sumologic and Splunk callback plugins are used send tasks resultsevents to collectors. This would discloses and collects any sensitive data.

criterions.comment: ansible: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
